title: Pump
description: In case the primary Laser is Pumped, this element describe a secondary Laser, positioned upstream of the primary Laser and used to pump it.

subCategoriesOrder.Pump: In case the primary Laser is Pumped, this element describe a secondary Laser, positioned upstream of the primary Laser and used to pump it.
subCategoriesOrder.Laser: This empty element refers to a Laser component used to as a Pump for the primary Laser.

Laser.description: This empty element refers to a Laser component used to as a Pump for the primary Laser.
